headline: Monolithic Power Systems Provides Earnings Commentary for the Quarter and Year Ended December 31, 2025
summary: SCHAFFHAUSEN, Switzerland, Feb. 05, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- MPS reported its results after market close on February 5, 2026 and will host a question-and-answer webinar at 2:00 p.m. PT / 5:00 p.m. ET. The webinar can be accessed at https://mpsic.zoom.us/j/99373894222. 2025 Financial Summary (Unaudited) GAAP 20252024 YoY ChangeYoY Change (%)Revenue ($k)$ 2,790,459$ 2,207,100 $ 583,35926.4%Gross Margin55.2%55.3% (0.1) pts(0.2)%Opex ($k)$ 811,105$ 681,512 $ 129,59319.0%Operating Margin26.1%24.4% 1.
